title: Couple With Heart Person Man Light Skin Tone No Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a person and a man, with a heart symbol between them. This is the gender-neutral and skin-tone-neutral version. It signifies love, romance, partnership, and affection.

On Apple devices, the subtle 3D shading and realistic lighting create a sense of intimacy and harmonious togetherness, perfect for expressing love, romance, or strong platonic bonds.
